channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiConverter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiConverter

item.title: CVE-2022-33877|2024-08-03T08:09:22.643Z -- fortinet -- forticonverter
item.description: An incorrect default permission [CWE-276] vulnerability in FortiClient (Windows) versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and 6.4.0 through 6.4.8 and FortiConverter (Windows) versions 6.2.0 through 6.2.1, 7.0.0 and all versions of 6.0.0 may allow a local authenticated attacker to tamper with files in the installation folder, if FortiClient or FortiConverter is installed in an insecure folder.
